--- title: Plot keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Each submodule requires it's own notebook. The title of the notebook must be the name of the submodule. " description: "Each submodule requires it's own notebook. The title of the notebook must be the name of the submodule. " nb_path: "plot.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

This notebook exists as an example of how to export generic alike functions from one notebook to under another part of the module and not the default exp. Now we can define generic plot functions in the other notebooks, and export them under a plot module. This makes more sense than to export plot functions under data module.

Similarly, one could add other notebooks for generic helper functions.
